<title level="1" right="Hazard 4" pfs="">[Valmar's Pit Trap](/Hazards.aspx?ID=362)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Mechanical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=105" />
<trait label="Trap" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=158" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #188: They Watched the Stars](/Sources.aspx?ID=194) pg. 49</row>

**Complexity** Simple

</column>

The ground here is made of loosely packed soil that, when stepped upon, collapses.

---

**Stealth**
DC 25 (expert)

**Disable**
DC 22 [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) (trained) to reinforce the dirt so it's safe to walk on, or DC 18 [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) (trained) to collapse the trap from a safe distance.

<column gap="tiny">

**AC** 10, **Fort** +2, **Ref** +3

**Hardness**
1

**HP**
6 (BT 3)

**Immunities**
critical hits, object immunities, precision damage

</column>

**Collapse** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature steps onto any space in the dotted area on the map, or at least 30 pounds of pressure is put on the area; **Effect** The ground gives way. The triggering creature falls 20 feet down the hole, taking 10 bludgeoning damage and landing prone in area **E10**. A creature can [Grab an Edge](/Actions.aspx?ID=95) to avoid falling.

---
**Reset**
Creatures can still fall into the pit, but the soil must be replaced for the trap to become hidden again.
